Athletic Club Member Events Visit Addison Event Calendar

30 Result(s) Found

Ageless Grace Brain and Body Class

02 Feb 2026 Ageless Grace is a Brain Health Program based on consciously choosing to change the brain through physical movements similar to playful childhood activities that fire up neurons and develop neural pathways.

3 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Addison Book Club

02 Feb 2026 Join the Addison Book Club once a month to discuss books with neighbors and friends!

10 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Senior Mexican Train Dominoes

03 Feb 2026 Join us on the 1st and 3rd Tuesday of each month for a friendly game of Mexican Train. This free program is open to anyone who would like to play.

1 more date

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Senior Technology Hour

03 Feb 2026 Join us for Senior Technology Hour, a time dedicated to helping seniors become more comfortable with technology. Whether you have questions about smartphones, tables, computers, or other devices, this is a great opportunity to learn and get hands-on help.

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Canceled Toddler Spring Dance

03 Feb 2026 Introduce your little one to the joy of movement with this class! This fun and engaging program helps develop coordination, rhythm, and confidence while learning basic dance steps in a supportive environment. The class blends ballet and tap techniques to spark creativity and foster a love for dance.

12 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Canasta

04 Feb 2026 Come play Canasta, a rummy-like card game played with partners. Meet every week to build up your knowledge and become a card shark!

3 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Kickboxing with McSweeney MMA

04 Feb 2026 There's something for all ages and skill levels with kickboxing class for ages 4 and up. Join us Wednesdays and Fridays for kickboxing with McSweeney MMA at the Club.

7 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Kids Spring Dance

05 Feb 2026 Introduce your little one to the joy of movement with this class! This fun and engaging program helps develop coordination, rhythm, and confidence while learning basic dance steps in a supportive environment. The class blends ballet and tap techniques to spark creativity and foster a love for dance.

12 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Argentine Tango

05 Feb 2026 Whether you're a seasoned dancer or a first-timer, this class offers a journey to the elegance and passion of tango! Learn fundamental steps, techniques, and expressions of the dance. Register solo or with a partner, there will be exercises for both focusing on connection, posture, footwork, and musicality. Pre-register for classes a la carte, or all together.

6 more dates

Tagged as: , Athletic Club Members

Pet Adoption Event

06 Feb 2026 Big news for our furry friends!

Were thrilled to partner with Java & Hopps Cafe to host pet adoption events right in the heart of the community. Join us February 6 from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. during their busiest hours to meet adoptable pets looking for their forever homes.

Java & Hopps,4970 Addison Circle,Addison, TX75001
